name: String Theory (itch) (GradientOGames)
description:
Aspect ratios other than 16:9 doesn't play nicely with this game unfortunately, but still works :).

Use your knowledge of string theory to get a ball to a final target. Complete many levels and discover fun ways to complete your objective. Try to beat the last level I dare you. my record was 00:25:17:334 beat that!

-17 levels,

-sandbox,

-fun brain-teasing gameplay.

I tried to imitate the Kurzgesagt art style in this game at the best of my ability, although I'm not very good at vector art. That is why I made this game as a submission for:

Mini Jam 123

Kurzgesagt video on string theory:
